p: Previous studies have identified more than sixty compounds in RTL. The compounds obtained by separation and purification are mainly flavonoids, triterpenes, and steroids also containing long-chain fatty acids, alkaloids, and lignans [ 11– 13]. However, there remains a void in the literature regarding the role of these potent RTL compounds alleviating hepatic glucose uptake. Therefore, we aimed to screen the best glucose uptake activity of TNF- α-induced IR in FL83B hepatocytes with ethyl acetate (EA) fractions of RTL by using thin-layer chromatography (TLC) and high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) to identify and characterize the specific potent compounds.
